seoDescription: International Blockchain Olympiad is a multidisciplinary design and building competition. IBCOL 2019 invites students from around the world to solve real-world challenges through decentralised applications.
subHeading: Powering a new generation of humans and stretching across the borders

section01.title: The Indian Blockchain Olympiad
section01.contentHTML:
Cultivate meaningful relationships with people across the country

The INdian BlockChain OLympiad (IN-BCOL) invites the current and recently graduated students to solve real-world problems using blockchain or distributed ledger technology.

It is a part of the International BlockChain OLympiad (IBCOL), which is the worldâ€™s largest gathering of budding and reigning experts in applied blockchain and cryptography.

The top teams of IN-BCOL will represent India in HongKong and get a chance to engage with leaders from 36+ countries, win astounding prizes worth more than $10,000 and earn life-changing opportunities.
section01.icon1:
work work work
business_center business_center
section01.desc1:
Solve problems spanning across different landscapes.

Contestants need to define their own problem scopes and devise a plan to solve it.
section01.icon2:
event_seat event_seat event_seat
airplay airplay
section01.desc2:
Express a whole new approach and show your perspective to the world.

Contestants are expected to submit a whitepaper proposing their approach to a problem statement.
section01.icon3:
laptop developer_mode laptop_chromebook
laptop_windows laptop_mac
section01.desc3:
Change your mindset, build something impactful and change the mindset of others.

Contestants can build something meaningful for the world or work on the problem statements provided by leading companies.

section06.title: How to get started
section06.icon1:
local_offer local_offer local_offer
local_offer local_offer local_offer
section06.desc1HTML:
Emerge as a Blockchain leader with our online and offline training designed using an industry-first approach and get certified. Register now and join the priority queue.

Want to organize a master class in your neighbourhood or university? Contact us at in@ibcol.org
section06.icon2:
local_offer loyalty local_offer
local_offer local_offer loyalty
section06.desc2HTML: Listen to emerging technology leaders and learn from their experiences. Stay tuned for more updates.

section06.desc3HTML:
Tune in with changemakers(contestants, trainers, and mentors) across the country at https://forum.zubi.io

Want to stay updated? Follow us on Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
